alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Brule; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 1:49PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central South Dakota. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until noon CST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Brule; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Jerauld
